body:
## Contact a solicitor

A solicitor can give you legal advice about miscarriage of justice compensation.  [Find a solicitor in your area](https://solicitors.lawsociety.org.uk/)

## Law centres

Law centres have solicitors and other advisers who can give you free legal advice. [Find a law centre in your area](https://www.lawcentres.org.uk/policy-and-media/the-case-for-law-centres)

## Citizens Advice

Citizens Advice offers free advice on a wide range of issues. [Find your local Citizens advice](https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/)
heading: You must have made a claim within 2 years of your conviction being overturned to get compensation
lede: You can get help and advice if you don't know your legal rights.
